events.message: Customer reported a car collision resulting in front bumper damage and scratches to the left door. Claim officially filed.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident following review of keywords including vehicle and collision details.
An agent specialized in auto claims was assigned to the case to ensure prompt handling of the car accident claim.
Customer received confirmation that the vehicle accident claim has been acknowledged and is now under review.
Request sent to customer for police report, photos of collision damage, and vehicle registration documentation.
Customer provided all requested documents, including detailed pictures and the official police report related to the accident.
Investigation team began reviewing submitted documents and police report to assess responsibility and damages.
Investigation concluded; vehicle damage verified and liability assigned based on evidence collected from accident site.
Proposed settlement amount communicated to customer covering repair costs and associated expenses from the auto collision.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and appreciated the clear communication throughout the process.
Claim officially approved for the proposed settlement amount, authorization granted for payment processing.
Settlement payment issued directly to customerâ€™s bank account to cover all repair expenses related to the vehicle accident.
The vehicle accident claim has been formally closed following successful settlement and payment issuance.
